ck_delivery_pjp: Delivery PJP (plan journey plan) – planned delivery visits by beat/outlet
ck_location: Locations / geography hierarchy – areas, regions, zones, cities, etc.
ck_order_details: Order line items – per-SKU quantities and amounts for each order
ck_order_history: Order status history – status changes and audit for orders
ck_orders: Orders – header-level order records (outlet, dates, totals)
ck_outlet_details: Outlet / store details – retail outlets, addresses, contacts
ck_outlet_details_hierarchymetadata: Outlet hierarchy metadata – links outlets to hierarchy metadata
ck_outlet_product_info: Outlet product info – product/price list info per outlet
ck_productdetails: Product/SKU details – SKU master (brand, category, MRP, etc.)
ck_productmetadata: Product pricing and metadata – prices and metadata per SKU/location
ck_sales: Sales transactions – invoice/sales header (amounts, outlet, dates)
ck_sales_details: Sales line items – per-SKU quantities and amounts for each sale
ck_sales_history: Sales history – status/transaction history for sales
dms_loadout: DMS loadout header – load-out number, status/type/source, vehicle, created/delivery/settlement timestamps, and total quantities/amounts
dms_loadout_details: DMS loadout details – invoices mapped to a loadout (invoice_number), plus outlet/route/preseller and totals per invoice
dms_loadout_items: DMS loadout items – per-SKU quantities/amounts inside a loadout detail (invoice) including batch_id/batch_code and item_type (NORMAL/FREE)
